analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0x428fb1b92dcedaf61e910a23c008d900a8d1a2ce.sol:
	Contract BAGToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0x428fb1b92dcedaf61e910a23c008d900a8d1a2ce.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x428fb1b92dcedaf61e910a23c008d900a8d1a2ce.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/22/0x428fb1b92dcedaf61e910a23c008d900a8d1a2ce.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0x428fb1b92dcedaf61e910a23c008d900a8d1a2ce.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
